title: Top-Rated Adults-Only Lake Tekapo Retreat with Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up the awe-inspiring natural beauty of Lake Tekapo, located between Queenstown and Christchurch on New Zealand’s South Island, at the luxurious Ranginui B&B. Relax and unwind while witnessing some of New Zealand’s best views - including stunning vistas of the crystal-clear lake and famed Mackenzie Basin - at this spectacularly located stay. The attentive in-house hosts are on hand to help with planning excursions in the area, and their faultless service has earned them countless five-star reviews and a Travellers' Choice 2020 badge on Tripadvisor.

Enjoy a romantic, adults-only escape at this serene retreat, exclusively for guests aged 16 years and over. Immerse yourself in nature (or stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi), enjoy bespoke service that only in-house hosts can deliver and wake up to awe-inspiring panoramas over the Southern Alps' snowy peaks and majestic mountains from one of just three private lake-view suites.

title: Top-Rated Adults-Only Lake Tekapo Retreat with Hot Springs Pass & Daily Breakfast
description:
Soak up the awe-inspiring natural beauty of Lake Tekapo, located between Queenstown and Christchurch on New Zealand’s South Island, at the luxurious Ranginui B&B. Relax and unwind while taking in some of New Zealand’s best views - including stunning vistas of the crystal-clear lake and famed Mackenzie Basin - at this spectacularly located stay. The attentive in-house hosts are on hand to help with planning excursions in the area, and their faultless service has earned them countless five-star reviews and a Travellers' Choice 2021 badge on Tripadvisor.

Enjoy a romantic, adults-only escape at this serene retreat, exclusively for guests aged 16 years and over. Immerse yourself in nature (or stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi), enjoy bespoke service that only in-house hosts can deliver and wake up to awe-inspiring panoramas over the Southern Alps' snowy peaks and majestic mountains from one of just three private lake-view suites.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Daily continental breakfast of fresh fruit, homemade yoghurt and muesli, cereals and bread
- Enjoy a welcome bottle of Deutz Marlborough Cuvee Brut NV on arrival
- Indulge in a delicious sharing platter and a glass of wine each at Blue Lake Eatery & Bar
- Make the most of the great outdoors with two passes for the gorgeous Tekapo Springs
- Guaranteed 11am late checkout allows you to relax until the very last moment

title: South Island Serene Lake Tekapo Peppers Resort with Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to this glorious corner of the world and immerse yourself in superb natural beauty with a stay at Peppers Bluewater Resort Lake Tekapo, overlooking the shores of Lake Tekapo on New Zealand’s South Island. Set amid the purest natural landscape, every element and design feature of the resort reflects the beautiful surroundings. Each of the rooms has been thoughtfully crafted to feel like a serene hideaway while the onsite facilities, including the Rakinui Restaurant, highlight the sweeping vistas of Lake Tekapo to great effect.

A destination that is equally as breathtaking by day as it is at night, Lake Tekapo is part of an International Dark Sky Reserve, making it perfect for stargazing at night. Make the most of having the Southern Alps on your doorstep, immerse yourself in the Tekapo Springs Day Spa, hike the nearby trails, drop a fishing line into the water and explore the diverse sights within close reach.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Arrive to a welcome bottle of wine and a selection of chocolates in your room
- Fuel up for the day with daily cooked breakfast at Rakinui Restaurant
- Indulge a little further with a 15% discount on dining at Rakinui Restaurant
- Hit the snooze button one final time with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**Upgrade Bonus**: Stay in the Two-Bedroom Lakeview Suite or the Three-Bedroom Lakeview Villa and receive an additional bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: State Highway 8, Lake Tekapo 7945, New Zealand

title: Serene Self-Contained Apartment Stay near Lake Tekapo with Tranquil Pool, Hot Tub & BBQ Entertainment Area
description: Discover the beauty of New Zealand's South Island with a charming self-contained apartment stay moments from the spectacular Lake Tekapo. Take in breathtaking alpine vistas and huddle around the outdoor fireplace on chilly evenings. If you wish to explore, a visit to the Aoraki Mackenzie International Dark Sky Reserve is a must for stargazers. Back at the property, cook up a feast with the BBQ facilities, or take a dip in the heated outdoor pool or hot tub.
offer_address: 1 Beauchamp Place, Lake Tekapo 7999, New Zealand

title: Secluded Alpine Lakefront Escape Overlooking Lake Tekapo with Onsite Restaurant
description: Soak up the alpine beauty of New Zealand's Southern Alps from this tranquil resort, perfectly placed on the pristine shores of Lake Tekapo and nestled amid the scenic landscapes of Mackenzie Basin. Boasting stylish studios and self-contained villas, you can spend your days exploring the nearby Church of the Good Shepherd and stargazing at the world-renowned Dark Sky Project, or hiking the picturesque mountain trails. Back at the resort, you can savour local flavours at the Rakinui Restaurant or sip on a drink at the cosy lounge bar, all while taking in the breathtaking lake vistas.
offer_address: State Highway 8, Lake Tekapo, Canterbury 7945, New Zealand
